The '''Translator Cape''' and the '''Chinese Translator Cape''' are [[capes]] given to notable contributors on the [[Crowdin|''Minecraft'' translation project in Crowdin]].

== Appearance ==
Both capes look identical when viewed from the back, only differing on their undersides. The Translator Cape depicts a pink "T", whereas the Chinese Translator Cape depicts a Chinese flag, similar to the Japanese flag on the underside of [[cheapsh0t's Cape]].

== Distribution ==
=== Translator Cape ===
The Translator Cape is given to [[Crowdin#Proofreaders|proofreaders]] notable for their contribution.

=== Chinese Translator Cape ===
The Chinese Translator Cape was given to [[User:Powup333|Powup333]], [[User:Craft Lawrence|Craft_Lawrence]], and [[User:sjjklh|sjjklh]] for their contribution in Chinese.
